name: egg_hunt
description: A simple easter egg hunt game
author: voximity

eggAsset.description: The brick asset to use for eggs.

eggSize.description: The brick size to use for eggs. If the brick asset is NOT procedural, leave blank or set to 0,0,0.

amount.description: If less than 1, a percent of how many eggs to spawn. If over 1, a fixed number of eggs to spawn.

auth.description: A list of users who can load and place eggs.

gameLength.description: How long the game should last, in seconds.

autorestartDelay.description: How long to wait, in seconds, before auto restarting to the next round. Set to 0 to disable auto restarting.
